ch0243_41_yuri/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0243_41_yuri/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s have a blast today and make it the
best day ever!
ch0243_41_yuri/7101_0701_01_10:
My heart sparkles every time I see
Tera Pokémon!
ch0243_41_yuri/7101_0701_02_10:
They lift my spirits and make me think,
“I can do this! I’ll give it my all!”
ch0243_41_yuri/7102_0701_01_10:
I really love this outfit. It’s just so
gorgeous and adorable, like a
party dress!
ch0243_41_yuri/7102_0701_02_10:
I’d love to wear it while battling in a
stadium alongside Cinderace!
ch0243_41_yuri/7102_0701_03_10:
I want lots of people to watch us shine
and see how strong we are!
ch0243_41_yuri/7103_0701_01_10:
Have you ever heard of Gigantamax
Curry?
ch0243_41_yuri/7103_0701_02_10:
The rice is piled high like a mountain,
and the curry portion is huge! It even
shines a bit!
ch0243_41_yuri/7103_0701_03_10:
I wonder if Paldea has a Terastal curry
that shines even brighter.
ch0243_41_yuri/7104_0701_01_10:
Let’s go camping sometime with
everyone on Pasio!
ch0243_41_yuri/7104_0701_02_10:
We can cook curry together, play with
our Pokémon, and set off fireworks
at night!
ch0243_41_yuri/7104_0701_03_10: I bet it’ll be the best memory ever!
ch0243_41_yuri/7105_0701_01_10:
Even if you make mistakes or lose a
battle, as long as you don’t lose the
spark in your heart, things will work out!
ch0243_41_yuri/7105_0701_02_10:
If you ever feel down, remember that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_41_yuri/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! Perfect timing! Here, this is for you!
ch0243_41_yuri/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you have the best day today!
ch0243_41_yuri/2501_0701_01_10:
Apparently, you can learn about
Terastallizing at an academy in Paldea!
ch0243_41_yuri/2501_0701_02_10:
I bet it’s so much fun studying with
everyone in the same classroom!
ch0243_41_yuri/2501_0701_03_10:
I wish there were a school in Galar
where I could learn about Dynamaxing.
ch0243_41_yuri/2501_0702_01_10:
Leon and Professor Magnolia taught me
about Dynamaxing before, but...
ch0243_41_yuri/2501_0702_02_10:
I used it in battle right away, so I don’t
really know the details.
ch0243_41_yuri/2501_0702_03_10:
Maybe I should set aside some time to
study it properly!
ch0243_41_yuri/2511_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I catch myself thinking maybe
ordinary days when nothing big happens
are actually the most special.
ch0243_41_yuri/2511_0701_02_10:
Being able to hang out with your friends
and Pokémon means you’re having fun,
right?
ch0243_41_yuri/2511_0701_03_10:
When those days keep happening,
it’s something truly special!
ch0243_41_yuri/2511_0702_01_10:
We don’t know what’s gonna happen in
10 years, 20 years, or even a thousand.
ch0243_41_yuri/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s why I wanna enjoy the present as
much as I can!
ch0243_41_yuri/2511_0702_03_10:
If every day’s fun, the future’s bound to
shine bright!
ch0243_41_yuri/3001_0701_01_10:
Heeey, are you awake? If you’re still
sleepy, let’s have a battle to wake
you up!
ch0243_41_yuri/3003_0701_01_10:
Each day is unique, even if it feels just
like any other. So let’s make the most
of it!
ch0243_41_yuri/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s getting dark, but let’s light things
up with the shine of the Terastal
phenomenon!
